summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster noting several inmates on suicide watch, providing administrative context for the facility's operations on that date.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with a total of 758 inmates counted across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document records an official inmate count of 758 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 10, 2019.
An inmate roster from the same date lists several inmates with assignment codes indicating 'SUICIDE' status, suggesting they were on suicide watch.
The administrative forms include count slips and rosters, indicating standard prison operations and record-keeping procedures.
No specific named individuals (inmates or staff) are identifiable in the provided text; all references are to units, counts, or redacted/blank signature lines.
